sys_ui_macro.description: show user Needit popup link activate by: - set the active field in this macro to true - adding the attribute to a dictionary field: ref_contributions=x_58872_needit_user_show_needit_rec
sys_ui_macro.name: user_show_needit_rec
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" />
<j:set var="jvar_n" value="show_needitrelatedrecord_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/>
<g:reference_decoration id="${jvar_n}" field="${ref}"
  onclick="showRelatedNIList('${ref}'); "
  title="${gs.getMessage('Show related Needit Records')}" image="images/icons/tasks.gifx" icon="icon-tree-right"/>

<script>
// show related list
function showRelatedNIList(reference) {
	try {
		var displayValue = g_form.getDisplayBox(reference).value;
		var title = 'Showing Needit records related to: ' + displayValue;
		var s = reference.split('.');
		var referenceField = s[s.length - 1];
		var query = referenceField + '=' + g_form.getValue(reference);

		var gdw = new GlideModal('show_list');
		gdw.setTitle(title);
		gdw.setSize(750);
		gdw.setPreference('table', 'x_58872_needit_needit_list');
		gdw.setPreference('sysparm_query', query);
		gdw.setPreference('title', 'A New NI Title');
		gdw.render();
	} catch (e) {
		jslog('error showing related list');
		jslog(e);
	}
}

</script>
</j:jelly>
